resources.string: Runa enters with purpose, the clinking of her sturdy armor announcing her arrival, her strong hands calloused from forging, a determined glint in her eyes. \n\n"A tankard of your strongest ale, a brew that feels as sturdy as the metal I forge. The clang of hammers and the heat of the forge made for a long day, a robust drink\'s in order."

string-array.name: player_runa
string-array.item: A day of forging requires a sturdy drink. May it match the strength of the metal you work with.
Strong ale for a strong day, but hope it doesn\'t forge its way out of your tankard.
A tankard as sturdy as your resolve. Maybe my company could add a different kind of strength?
